name: UnitZ2
description: This game, like all other shooters about the zombie apocalypse! Fortunately, the project is not yet complete. I'm from Russia, so now I'm sitting and translating into a Google translator, and something can be wrong! Therefore, I write at once: the game has a multi-user mode, so maybe I'll make an update that will add the ability to fight not against bots, but against each other! This game, like all other shooters about the zombie apocalypse! Fortunately, the project is not yet complete. I'm from Russia, so now I'm sitting and translating into a Google translator, and something can be wrong! Therefore, I write at once: the game has a multiplayer game, so maybe I'll make an update that will add the ability to fight not against bots, but against each other!
